content: A conscience is a guide who cannot remain without inflicting punishment for misdeeds. But it has given warning for avoiding misdeed number of times.
May  Almighty  illuminate  our  intellect  and inspire us towards  the  righteous  path.
The only test of the development of intellect is whether one has started controlling uncontrolled desires.
Balance between knowledge, judgement and actions is true wisdom.
He who has given up artificiality, deception, and cunningness and has adopted honesty as the policy of his life, is the wisest man of the world.
He who speaks too much and pretends to show his knowledge is not wise. Wise is he who integrates his conduct with his knowledge.
